${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:MyCard.NAME: MyCard
${modID}:MyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.

${modID}:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:HeavyKnife.NAME: Heavy Knife
${modID}:HeavyKnife.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If this defeats an enemy, take an extra turn after this one. NL End your turn.
${modID}:HeavyKnife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If this defeats an enemy, take an extra turn after this one. NL End your turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:TripmineGrenade.NAME: Tripmine Grenade
${modID}:TripmineGrenade.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.
${modID}:TripmineGrenade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${modID}:TrappersAmbush.NAME: Trapper's Ambush
${modID}:TrappersAmbush.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! Weak to an enemy. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TrappersAmbush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL Apply !M! Weak to an enemy. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StylishExecution.NAME: Stylish Execution
${modID}:StylishExecution.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage again for each unique debuff applied to the enemy.
${modID}:StylishExecution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage again for each unique debuff applied to the enemy.

${modID}:EchoOfHarvest.NAME: Echo Of Harvest
${modID}:EchoOfHarvest.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you Exhaust a card gain !M! Temporary HP.
${modID}:EchoOfHarvest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you Exhaust a card gain !M! Temporary HP.

${modID}:VanishingStep.NAME: VanishingStep
${modID}:VanishingStep.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block and Exhaust up to 2 cards.
${modID}:VanishingStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block and Exhaust up to 2 cards.

${modID}:EchoShield.NAME: Echo Shield
${modID}:EchoShield.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block NL Generate a temporary Echo Shield in your hand.
${modID}:EchoShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block NL Generate a temporary Echo Shield in your hand.

${modID}:EchoShieldToken.NAME: Echo Shield
${modID}:EchoShieldToken.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block NL Generate a temporary Echo Shield in your hand NL Exhaust.
${modID}:EchoShieldToken.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block NL Generate a temporary Echo Shield in your hand NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CombinationBlow.NAME: Combination Blow
${modID}:CombinationBlow.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage !M! time{!M!|>1=s}. NL If Fatal, permanently increase this card's number of  hits by 1. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CombinationBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage !M! time{!M!|>1=s}. NL If Fatal, permanently increase this card's number of  hits by 1. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GunpowderGamble.NAME: Gunpowder Gamble
${modID}:GunpowderGamble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. If the last card played this combat was *Solar-Infused, hit an extra time.
${modID}:GunpowderGamble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. If the last card played this combat was *Solar-Infused, hit an extra time.

${modID}:AcrobatsDodge.NAME: Acrobat's Dodge
${modID}:AcrobatsDodge.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL This card's Block is affected by Strength.
${modID}:AcrobatsDodge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL This card's Block is affected by Strength.

${modID}:BladeBarrage.NAME: Blade Barrage
${modID}:BladeBarrage.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies.
${modID}:BladeBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ElementalPlating.NAME: Elemental Plating
${modID}:ElementalPlating.DESCRIPTION: {@@}For each other *Solar-Infused card in your hand, gain 2 Plated Armor.
${modID}:ElementalPlating.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL For each other *Solar-Infused card in your hand, gain 2 Plated Armor.

${modID}:BarrierOfVoid.NAME: Barrier of Void
${modID}:BarrierOfVoid.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block for every card in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BarrierOfVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block for every card in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ConsumeTheFuture.NAME: Consume The Future
${modID}:ConsumeTheFuture.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Exhaust your draw pile. NL Add a new random card to your hand for each card Exhausted NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ConsumeTheFuture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain NL Exhaust your draw pile. NL Add a new random card to your hand for each card Exhausted. NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FeedTheVoid.NAME: Feed The Void
${modID}:FeedTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, Exhaust up to one card.
${modID}:FeedTheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, Exhaust up to one card.

${modID}:SpectralBlades.NAME: Spectral Blades
${modID}:SpectralBlades.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Gain ${modID}:Super_Armor and 3 Strength for !M! turns. NL Gain 15 Temporary HP.
${modID}:SpectralBlades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Gain ${modID}:Super_Armor and 3 Strength for !M! turns. NL Gain 15 Temporary HP.

${modID}:StareIntoTheVoid.NAME: Stare Into The Void
${modID}:StareIntoTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Ethereal. NL Lose !M!% of current Hp. Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
${modID}:StareIntoTheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Ethereal. NL Lose !M!% of current Hp. Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand

${modID}:EmbraceMadness.NAME: Embrace Madness
${modID}:EmbraceMadness.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.
${modID}:EmbraceMadness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:ExpelDarkness.NAME: Expel Darkness
${modID}:ExpelDarkness.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Transfer your Weak Vulnerable and Frail to an enemy. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ExpelDarkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Transfer your Weak Vulnerable and Frail to an enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ShunTheLight.NAME: Shun The Light
${modID}:ShunTheLight.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Consume !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light to gain !B! Block.
${modID}:ShunTheLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Consume !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light to gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Equalize.NAME: Equalize
${modID}:Equalize.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Consume all ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light NL Gain Energy equal to half the amount removed. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Equalize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Consume all ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light NL Gain Energy equal to half the amount removed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MonteCarlo.NAME: Monte Carlo
${modID}:MonteCarlo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL This card's damage is increased by your ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light.
${modID}:MonteCarlo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL This card's damage is increased by your ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light

${modID}:VigilanceWing.NAME: Vigilance Wing
${modID}:VigilanceWing.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If your hand contains 3 or less other cards, deal !D! damage again.
${modID}:VigilanceWing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If your hand contains 3 or less other cards, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:FlareBlast.NAME: Flare Blast
${modID}:FlareBlast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Temporary HP for each enemy hit.
${modID}:FlareBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Temporary HP for each enemy hit.

${modID}:LightningStrike.NAME: Lightning Strike
${modID}:LightningStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! Damage. NL Choose a card from your discard pile to return to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LightningStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! Damage NL Choose a card from your discard pile to return to your hand.

${modID}:JumpStart.NAME: Jump Start
${modID}:JumpStart.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} and gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:JumpStart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} and gain [E] [E].

${modID}:CompoundingExhaustion.NAME: Compounding Exhaustion
${modID}:CompoundingExhaustion.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. When Exhausted add a copy of this card to your hand that costs 1 more and does twice as much damage.
${modID}:CompoundingExhaustion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. When Exhausted add a copy of this card to your hand that costs 1 more and does twice as much damage.

${modID}:VolatileCollapse.NAME: Volatile Collapse
${modID}:VolatileCollapse.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
${modID}:VolatileCollapse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:RagingCurrent.NAME: Raging Current
${modID}:RagingCurrent.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you draw a card this turn, gain !M! Block.
${modID}:RagingCurrent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you draw a card this turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:ShockingTumble.NAME: Shocking Tumble
${modID}:ShockingTumble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, gain !B! Block again.
${modID}:ShockingTumble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, gain !B! Block again.

${modID}:TempestStrike.NAME: Tempest Strike
${modID}:TempestStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage again.
${modID}:TempestStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:FulminisDischarge.NAME: Fulminis Discharge
${modID}:FulminisDischarge.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL If you draw an *Arc-Infused card, gain !B! Block.
${modID}:FulminisDischarge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL If you draw an *Arc-Infused card, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:GatheringStorm.NAME: Gathering Storm
${modID}:GatheringStorm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of the enemy's NEXT turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.
${modID}:GatheringStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of the enemy's NEXT turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${modID}:LethalCurrent.NAME: Lethal Current
${modID}:LethalCurrent.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you play a card this turn, ALL Enemies loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LethalCurrent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you play a card this turn, ALL Enemies loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ElectroPlating.NAME: Electro Plating
${modID}:ElectroPlating.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Metallicize for every energy spent. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ElectroPlating.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Metallicize for every energy spent. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ArcStaff.NAME: Arc Staff
${modID}:ArcStaff.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Gain [E] and draw 1 card at the start of your next !M! turns. Gain 3 Dexterity and ${modID}:Super_Armor for !M! turns.
${modID}:ArcStaff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Gain [E] and draw 1 card at the start of your next !M! turns. Gain 3 Dexterity and ${modID}:Super_Armor for !M! turns.

${modID}:FlowState.NAME: Flow State
${modID}:FlowState.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Ethereal. NL Whenever you play an Attack, draw 1 card.
${modID}:FlowState.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you play an Attack, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Deadshot.NAME: Deadshot
${modID}:Deadshot.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of each turn, gain !M! Vigor.
${modID}:Deadshot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of each turn, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:Shadowshot.NAME: Shadowshot
${modID}:Shadowshot.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Apply ${modID}:Corpse_Explosion NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
${modID}:Shadowshot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Super NL Apply ${modID}:Corpse_Explosion NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FusionGrenade.NAME: Fusion Grenade
${modID}:FusionGrenade.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If you have an *Arc-Infused card and *Void-Infused card in your hand, remove all Block from the enemy and apply !M! Poison first.
${modID}:FusionGrenade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If you have an *Arc-Infused card and *Void-Infused card in your hand, remove all Block from the enemy and apply !M! Poison first.

${modID}:OnYourMark.NAME: On Your Mark
${modID}:OnYourMark.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Vigor and Temporary Strength for each *Solar-Infused card in your deck. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:OnYourMark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Vigor and Temporary Strength for each *Solar-Infused card in your deck.

${modID}:CalculatedSpark.NAME: Calculated Spark
${modID}:CalculatedSpark.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Energy next turn.
${modID}:CalculatedSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Energy next turn.

${modID}:StaticPass.NAME: Static Pass
${modID}:StaticPass.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies. Draw a card for each enemy hit.
${modID}:StaticPass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies. Draw a card for each enemy hit. NL Draw 1 additional card.

${modID}:PowerDifferential.NAME: Power Differential
${modID}:PowerDifferential.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Ethereal. NL Whenever you Attack, gain Block equal to half unblocked damage dealt.
${modID}:PowerDifferential.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you Attack, gain Block equal to half unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:CallLightningAttack.NAME: Spark
${modID}:CallLightningAttack.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you draw a card while this is in your discard pile, it returns to your hand.
${modID}:CallLightningAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you draw a card while this is in your discard pile, it returns to your hand.

${modID}:InvigoratingRoar.NAME: Invigorating Roar
${modID}:InvigoratingRoar.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Temporary HP. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:InvigoratingRoar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Temporary HP. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MasterOfLight.NAME: Master of Light
${modID}:MasterOfLight.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage, gain !B! Block, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Improved for each *Solar-Infused, *Void-Infused, and *Arc-Infused card in your deck. NL Retain. Exhaust.
${modID}:MasterOfLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage, gain !B! Block, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Improved for each *Solar-Infused, *Void-Infused, and *Arc-Infused card in your deck. NL Retain. Exhaust.

${modID}:WhisperOfTheWorm.NAME: Whisper of The Worm
${modID}:WhisperOfTheWorm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Every third time you play this, gain 2 Energy.
${modID}:WhisperOfTheWorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Every third time you play this, gain 2 Energy.

${modID}:Telesto.NAME: Telesto
${modID}:Telesto.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of the enemy's NEXT turn, it takes !M! damage. Triggers early when a card is Exhausted.
${modID}:Telesto.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of the enemy's NEXT turn, it takes !M! damage. Triggers early when a card is Exhausted.

${modID}:WardcliffCoil.NAME: Wardcliff Coil
${modID}:WardcliffCoil.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Hits an extra time for each other *Arc-Infused card in your hand, draw pile, and discard pile.
${modID}:WardcliffCoil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Hits an extra time for each other *Arc-Infused card in your hand, draw pile, and discard pile.

${modID}:Jotun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${modID}:WorldlineZero.NAME: Worldline Zero
${modID}:WorldlineZero.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.
${modID}:WorldlineZero.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${modID}:AceOfSpades.NAME: Ace of Spades
${modID}:AceOfSpades.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. If this defeats an enemy, deal !D! damage to ALL other enemies and gain !M! Strength.
${modID}:AceOfSpades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. If this defeats an enemy, deal !D! damage to ALL other enemies and gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:ChooseArc.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add a random *Arc-Infused card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
${modID}:ChooseArc.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add 2 random *Arc-Infused cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:ChooseVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add 2 random *Void-Infused cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:ChooseSolar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add 2 random *Solar-Infused cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:ShadowshotToken.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Ethereal NL ${modID}:Super NL Apply ${modID}:Corpse_Explosion NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
